channel.title: Adding Images To Quest Tab
channel.description: I am currently new with client editing/cache and I really want to make my quest tab look more decent. I want to add a normal quest tab background, and I would like to add more text in their such as Pk Points, Also Rank of the player and more. I currently have a PI server.

item.title: Adding Images To Quest Tab
item.dc:creator: @MooningPanda MooningPanda
item.description:
@MooningPanda wrote:

Joseph69:

I currently have a PI server.

Download the cache, make it local, and edit it from there. It should be that simple unless the cache is read from a write-protected file.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Images To Quest Tab
